0x00008020
0 0 0 0 8 0 2 0
0000 00/00 000/0 0000/ 1000 0/000 00/10 0000
000000 00000 00000 10000 00000 100000
add $s0, $0, $0
a)
0x20080001
2 0 0 8 0 0 0 1
0010 00/00 000/0 1000/ 0000 0000 0000 0001
8 0 8 1
addi $t0, $0, 1

0x20090064
2 0 0 9 0 0 6 4
0010 00/00 000/0 1001/ 0000 0000 0110 0100
8 0 9 100
addi $t1, $0, 100

0x11090003
1 1 0 9 0 0 0 3
0001 00/01 000/0 1001/ 0000 0000 0000 0011
4 8 9 3
beq $t1, $t0, 3

0x02088020
0 2 0 8 8 0 2 0
0000 00/10 000/0 1000/ 1000 0/000 00/10 0000
0 16 8 16 0 32
add $s0, $s0, $t0

0x21080001
2 1 0 8 0 0 0 1
0010 00/01 000/0 1000/ 0000 0000 0000 0001
4 4 4 1
beq $a0, $a0, 1

0x0810000c
0 8 1 0 0 0 0 12
0000 10/00 0001 0000 0000 0000 0000 1100
2 1048588
jump 

b)
adiciona 0 a $s0
adiciona 1 a $t0
adiciona 100 a $t1
if $t1 == $t0 avança 3 posições
guarda em $s0 a soma de $s0 com $t0
if $a0 == $a0 avança 1 posição
jump
